homeBanner.title: Protect Your Wallets from Dirty Money
homeBanner.subtitle: Receiving funds of illegal origin may lead to your assets being frozen

contactUs.title: Your question isn't listed?
contactUs.description: Contact us on Telegram. We’re available 24/7 to ensure comfort for everyone.
contactUs.infoSecondPart: but may not always respond quickly at night

suspiciousTransactions.title: Suspicious Transactions
suspiciousTransactions.description: Identifying assets linked to illegal activities, including fraud, terrorism, extortion, and other crimes.

investigations.title: Investigations
investigations.description: Review direct and indirect links between the specified address and identified clusters, the total amount sent to/from the target wallet, and the distance to it.

addressTracking.title: Address Tracking
addressTracking.description: Real-time tracking of all transactions related to the specified blockchain address, with instant notifications for incoming and outgoing transactions.

riskMessage.title: 23% of wallets hold risky assets, making users vulnerable to fraud, scams, or malicious actors.
riskMessage.description: AMLBot's risk assessment is based on data from numerous sources, ensuring we have the most reliable data in the industry.

securityFeatures.title: Ensure the Security of Your Cryptocurrency
securityFeatures.subtitle: Identify Potential Risks

protection.title: Protection from Account Suspension on CEX Platforms
protection.description: Regular checks of your crypto wallets and transactions can significantly reduce the risk of your assets being frozen on exchanges.

strengtheningSecurity.title: Strengthening Security
strengtheningSecurity.description: Identify and eliminate potential security threats to protect your investments and assets.

stayWithinLaw.title: Stay Compliant and Avoid Trouble
stayWithinLaw.description: Adhere to current regulations and avoid penalties. Regular checks help you comply with legal requirements, avoiding fines and legal issues.

firstStep.title: Telegram Bot
firstStep.description: Simply go to the Telegram bot and press the [AML] button to initiate a comprehensive check of your crypto wallet. This is a convenient option for users prioritizing anonymity and security.

secondStep.title: Website
secondStep.description: Use our user-friendly website to check your crypto wallet. The simple and intuitive interface lets you quickly get AML check results. If you have any questions or issues, our tech support is always ready to assist and promptly resolve your concerns.

individualApproach.title: Individual Approach
individualApproach.firstPoint: AMLBot offers a wide range of compliance solutions tailored to each client.
individualApproach.secondPoint: We are confident in meeting your requirements, having helped 300+ crypto companies of various scales in 25 jurisdictions.

integratedPlatform.title: Integrated Compliance Platform
integratedPlatform.firstPoint: We offer KYT/wallet assessments, KYC, AML, and more for crypto companies.
integratedPlatform.secondPoint: AMLBot's risk assessment is based on data from numerous sources, ensuring we have the most reliable data in the industry.
integratedPlatform.thirdPoint: Our services and solutions optimize your company's processes and eliminate compliance challenges.

saveCrypto.title: Protect Your Crypto by Identifying Risky Wallets and Transactions

firstStep.title: Wallet Connection
firstStep.description: Please select the wallet you wish to use

secondStep.title: Almost There
secondStep.description: Please click the “OK” button to sign the transaction
